ob.title: Konsil desid dat pro kombat kontr Drakon
ob.content:
Durantu sue prim sesion sidiurne, Konsil Komtian de Hellcraft votav in desision 6:0:2 ke kombat kontr Ender-Drakon aksidero u in saturndi, 28im yuni, u po ke konstruasioni de kastel Bloodspire es kompletifiked, omni kekos es plu tard. Setre, Konsil votav 5:3 transdonar Drakon-ov a Carlos po kombat tale ke il potes kuvar it, plase ke it es meted in musé. Plasu elkos, musé poteserio presentar fotografad in kualitet bas de ov in dom de Carlos.

Po debat prolonged e ke on proposav opsioni multupl, Konsil desidav adiurnar vote definitiv de kel sistem de adres deberio esar adopted ofisiale usk ke idé es rafined sufise e on av atined konsens. Tem de kel lingu konstrued debeserio adopted es et adiurned.

en.title: Council decides date for Dragon fight
en.content:
During its first session today, the Hellcraft County Council voted in a 6:0:2 decision that the fight against the Ender Dragon will happen either on Saturday, June 28, or after constructions on Castle Bloodspire are complete, whichever is later. Furthermore, the Council voted 5:3 to transfer the Dragon Egg to Carlos after the fight so he can hatch it, instead of putting it in a museum. Instead, the museum could showcase a low quality photo of the egg in Carlos' house.

After a prolonged debate and multiple options being proposed, the Council decided to postpone a definitive vote on which addressing system to adopt officially until the idea has been sufficiently workshopped and a consensus reached. The topic of which conlang to adopt was also postponed.
